author: hwright
msg: Enable parsing and unparsing sha1 checksums within representation skels.
(Representations): Add sha1 to the representation grammar.
(is_valid_checksum_skel): Add "sha1" to the valid checksum types.

author: kameshj
msg: Extend test for issue #3067 to cover the case when corresponding merge
source for the subtree with explicit mergeinfo has a broken history ('add'
followed by 'delete' and followed by 'revert of delete').
Tweak rest of the revision numbers as per the above change.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Add a couple of votes.
